misc: Known for deliberating his next shot for a long time, leading to somewhat slow play
biography: Panu, a familiar face from Kotojärven Kartanogolf, has graced the Hector Trophée with his presence on three occasions. While he may be known for his meticulous approach and the time he dedicates to each shot, leading to a slightly slower pace of play, his strategic thinking has proven fruitful.

Although Panu has decided to retire from the Hector Trophée, his contributions remain noteworthy. He has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once, marking a significant achievement in his career at the tournament.
While Panu's participation in Hector Trophée 2025 is not anticipated, golf enthusiasts will remember his prior performances and wish him well in his future endeavors.
